x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
PartsSource Integration - System creating Records for parts and Models
Every time when a part is ordered, multiple manufacturers, as well as models, are getting created by the system. Also, the values under the model field are parts that are active=false on the Clinical Models table.
When we create any CPOLITM of part type and purchase any part, System is creating a new record in parts & models table with the same number as Model name(in model) and OEM part name(in parts).
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: PartsSource -System creating Records
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
As per Script Include PartsSourceUtilsClient set autoInsert to false...this will stop parts from being created, along with their Company and Model records
This will prevent the integration from creating any part/model/manufacturer records. If the integration today is creating multipes that they consider duplicates, it's very likely that these are actually not duplicates, but instead are different records with slightly different part numbers/names
x_nuvo_diag_probes.script: var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil(); util.handleOutput('If using PartSource Integration, please navigate to script include named "PartsSourceUtilsClient" and uncomment the code. Set autoInsert to false (By default it is true). It will stop parts from being created, along with their Company and Model records.','information', 'HTM Asset Management');
